reviewText: Great scenery and history--- For a complete history of the Santa Fe Company from the time of its inception to the year 1887 read the book: The Story of the Santa Fe (1920)
My 3 year old son loves route of the chiefs. It's his favorite of the extreme steam series. We even bought it so se could download it to watch when we are not connected to the internet.
Learning what all went into 3751's longest trip. Can be a  bit dull at times, but it captures it all. Some nice trivia thrown in too for good measure.
My son is crazy for trains - specifically steam trains and watches this clip frequently. The footage is great and the trains are awesome!

It would have been much better if the company would let the steam engine go alone without all the three added diesel-electric locomotives which did not contribute anything to the magic of the refurbished steam engine.
I love watching train videos and this one is top notch. If you like  Santa Fe locomotives, this one is a must.
